Introduction
SDMMC_BlockLayer_RTOS_SDMMC002 App

Introduction

SDMMC_BlockLayer_RTOS_SDMMC002 App is specific to SD & MMC card block device in RTOS environment.It features all the SD & MMC card functionalities. This layer directly interfaces with SDMMC low level api's. FAT Filesystem doesn't support security features for SD/MMC device, so SDMMC card specific seurity features like Lock, Unlock, Setting Password,Clearing Password etc. needs to be directly called from this layer though ioctl's . The main idea behind this App is to to provide feasibility to Device Abstarction Layer to easily abstarct the block devices underlying it. Device specific features which are not supported by upper layers can be directly introduced in this layer.

Scope

SDMMC_BlockLayer_RTOS_SDMMC002 App interfaces with SDMMC Low level driver in RTOS environment.
Device Abstarction Layer then abstracts SDMMC_BlockLayer_RTOS_SDMMC002 app and other devices like USB as shown below:

SDMMC002_abbreviation

  1. SDMMC: Secure Digital/ Multimedia Card
  2. API: Application Program Interface
  3. GUI: Graphical User Interface
  4. IOCTL : Input/Output Control
  5. DMA: Direct Memory Access
  6. RTOS: Real Time Operating System
  7. LLD: Low Level Driver
  8. CSD: Card Specific Data
  9. CID: Card identification number
  10. OCR: Operation conditions register
  11. SCR: SD Configuration Register
  12. CSR: Card Status Register
  13. RCA: Relative card address

SDMMC002_reference

  1. https://www.sdcard.org/downloads/pls/simplified_specs/Part_A2_SD_Host_Controller_Simplified_Specification_Ver3.00_Final_110225.pdf
  2. https://www.sdcard.org/downloads/pls/simplified_specs/Part_1_Physical_Layer_Simplified_Specification_Ver_3.01_Final_100518.pdf"

SDMMC002_limitation

None
